## ğŸ”‘ Authority Established

### **Rule 1: Exclusive Modification Authority**

Only @process-assistant can:
- âœ… Modify `.github/docs/processes/*`
- âœ… Modify `.github/copilot-instructions-*.md`
- âœ… Modify `.github/agents/*.md`
- âœ… Create workflow definitions
- âœ… Enforce governance rules

All other agents:
- âŒ CANNOT modify protected files (will be reverted)
- âœ… CAN request changes via GitHub issue
- âœ… MUST use formal process for any changes

### **Rule 2: Formal Change Control**

```
Agent wants instruction change?
  â†“ File GitHub issue with rationale
  â†“ @process-assistant reviews
  â†“ APPROVED: @process-assistant makes change
  â†“ REJECTED: Explanation documented
  â†“ All related docs updated together
  â†“ Version number bumped
```

### **Rule 3: Workflow-Instruction Synchronization**

```
@process-assistant ensures workflow and instructions always match:
  Workflow says: "Backend creates entity"
  Instructions say: "Backend creates entity"
         â†“
       MATCH! âœ…
       
If they don't match â†’ @process-assistant fixes both
```

## ğŸ”„ How It Works

### **Normal Process**

```
Agent wants instruction change
        â†“
Files GitHub issue:
  @process-assistant instruction-request: [description]
  Body: What/Why/Impact/Impact
  Label: process-change-request
        â†“
@process-assistant reviews:
  - Consistent with workflows? âœ“
  - No conflicts with other agents? âœ“
  - Well-documented? âœ“
        â†“
APPROVED â†’ @process-assistant modifies
          Version bumped
          Commit with rationale
          Related docs updated
          Agents notified
          
OR

REJECTED â†’ Explanation documented
           Suggestions provided (if any)
```

### **Violation Process**

```
Unauthorized change detected
        â†“
REVERT immediately
        â†“
Notify violating agent:
  "This change was reverted (unauthorized)
   See GOVERNANCE_RULES.md for process
   File issue to request change formally"
        â†“
Tag @tech-lead (for awareness)
        â†“
Log in compliance tracker
        â†“
If repeated â†’ Escalate to @tech-lead
If continues â†’ Escalate to leadership
```
